# paragraph markers
#
# evidently there are (at least) three (!) different sizes
#
# So here is the scheme:
# a trailing / means small marker in folio
# a trailing - means medium marker in folio
# no trailing character means large marker in folio
# it's possible that there is an extra large marker
#   but it seems rare and I called it large
#
# The 1769/72 folio was the reference.
# I proofread the marks by looking at the 1772 quarto.
#   Things were mostly consistent except for:
#
# I Samuel 15:10 -- quarto has small marker
# Ecclesiastes 5:8 -- quarto has small marker
# Ecclesiastes 5:9 -- quarto has medium marker
# Isaiah 52:13 -- quarto has normal marker
#
# Other interesting things we noticed while doing this...
#   2 Samuel 17 MOreover
#   Psalms 59 DEliver
#   Ecclesiastes 12 REmember
#   Ezekiel 39 THerefore
# There are more of these so check them out.


(Genesis)
1 3 6 9 14 20 24 26 29
2 4 8 10 15 18 21
3 6 9/ 14- 16 21 22
4 8 17 19 25
5 6 9 12 15 18 21- 25 28/ 32
6 8 14/
7 7 10 17 21 24/
8 4 6/ 13 15 20
9 8 18 20 28
10 2 6 15 21
11 3 10 27 31
12 4 6 10 14/
13 7 10/ 14 18/
14 12 14 17 21
15 4/ 6 7 12
16 4 7 15
17 5 9 15 23
18 9 17- 23-
19 4- 12 24 26/ 27- 30 31
20 9/ 14- 17/
21 6 9 15 22 33
22 3 11 15/ 20/
23 3 19-
24 10 12 15 22 29- 34/ 50 62
25 5 7 11 12 19 21 24 27 29
26 2 6 12 18- 23 26/ 34
27 6 18 30 34 41 42
28 6 10 16- 20
29 9- 15 21 28 31
30 5 9 14 17 22 25- 37
31 3 17 22 31 36 43

33 17 18

(Acts)
